Body:
abs_path = os.path.abspath(os.path.dirname(__file__))
testdata = read_dnacoord(os.path.join(abs_path,
    'resources/natadjust_rvs_example.dat'))
for coord in testdata:
    coord.converthptodd()
    latcomp, longcomp, ell_htcomp = xyz2llh(coord.x, coord.y, coord.z)
    assert abs(latcomp - coord.lat) < 2e-09
    assert abs(longcomp - coord.long) < 2e-09
    assert abs(ell_htcomp - coord.ell_ht) < 0.0001
